rewardsInfo.description: All you can? You are that type of person who asks his grandma to open toilet lid cos its too heavy when he goes to take a dump, decreasing his microscopic weight even more. Go eat and train fcking moron, albeit you're shit now, I believe in you.
Things are not so bad, still you can do way better. Go to gym and make me 20 squat reps with weight with which you usually do 10. Right now
You are perfection, my dear! Just try to keep being so beatiful and strong as long as you can to make this world a little nicer. Kissing you in all allowed (and mb not only) places ðŸ˜˜ðŸ’‹
